Uncomment: Toolbar button tooltip for the Uncomment feature.
Comment: Toolbar button tooltip for the Comment feature.
Comment URL: Label for the URL input in the Comment URL editing balloon.
Edit comment: Button opening the Comment URL editing balloon.
Open comment in new tab: Button opening the comment in new browser tab.
This comment has no URL: Label explaining that a comment has no URL set (the URL is empty).
Open in a new tab: The label of the switch button that controls whether the edited comment will open in a new tab.
Downloadable: The label of the switch button that controls whether the edited comment refers to downloadable resource.
